subject: Re: [junit] Exceptionininitializererror
msgSnippet: Chris, I could guess.  But if you could try to boil down the example to 100 lines of code or less which exhibits the error, and post it here, it would be a
messageBody:
Chris,

I could guess. But if you could try to boil down the example to 100
lines of code or less which exhibits the error, and post it here, it
would be a huge help. Thanks,

David Saff

stanltheman wrote:
> In my test class, when I try to instantiate this certain class I get
> ExceptionInInitializerError. The superclass of this class has a static
> block.
> I can instantiate it fine outside of the test method and cannot see why
> this is happening. Can anyone shed some light on this problem?
>
> Thankyou,
> Chris.
